word:
You have made many mistakes, yet the Lord uses you still. Do not take credit to yourself. All that you are comes from God. It is the heavenly intelligences that work through human agents, and when you take any glory to yourself by exalting yourself, you greatly dishonor God; for you reveal a disposition that 


                                     -48- 

shows you are not yoked up with Christ, but are drawing a load on your own account. Many do this.
